metadataAttributes.Title: Business Value and Project Management Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Coursework to build great organizational leaders.. Learners will be able to form a more wholistic perspective on business fundamentals and better manage organizational development, change, and projects.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Organizational Structure, Project Execution, Financial Accounting, Strategic Management, Project Management, Accounting, Accrual, Financial Statement, Cash Flow, Cash Flow Statement, Knowledge of General Business Functions, Organization Design,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Oktay Urcan ,Michael Bednar ,E. Geoffrey Love ,Fataneh Taghaboni-Dutta, Ph.D., PMP, CSM, CSPO ,
